comment: Professor Gambrell is the best professor I have ever had. He truly cares about what he is teaching and was so kind and helpful through all assignments. He made sure all students feel acknowledged and seen and to never hesitate to ask questions. The discussion in his class was so interesting and I looked forward to it every day.

This Professor is AMAZING, and you should take him. If he taught more classes, I would take them with him. He truly cares about his students, is always available for questions with quick responses, and understands that we have lives outside of his class. If you have something interfering with an assignment due date, he will work with you. TAKE HIM
Professor Gambrell is very understanding and is easy to talk to. The work load is not a lot at all and would definitely recommend.

Mr. Gambrell seems like he cares for his students. He gives a lot of feedback. His class was an easy A. I took his class in the summer and there were not many assignments. Final project is the only heavy work you will do all semester, but he will help you if need be.
He is the most fantastic teacher. Please take him if you can. Not only is he incredibly understanding, but he really values us as students. He wants us to be good teachers.

amazing class!!! although covid ruined some of our chances to do group work, he still found a way for us to all work together and have class discussions. It was a class that was very manageable and id always look forward to going to! he makes you feel invited and welcome & cares for you as a person & as a student too. the workload was never a lot!

This class had a lot of useless work with just a few meaningful things. The professor is caring, but he is giving out assignments that hit nerves, and I feel like this class does not hit the message it should be. He was a good professor though if you have to take this. There's a lot of work to do on your own and with groups without any oversight.
